Package com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.defaults

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultBible
    Created by Casey on 3/18/2015.
    DefaultFormatter
    Formatter is a class that allows for the customization of how verses are printed to the screen.
    DefaultFormatter.DashedLetter
    Replace all words with underscores but keeps the first letter.
    DefaultFormatter.Dashes
    Replace all words with underscores, to give a visual representation of how long each word is.
    DefaultFormatter.FirstLetters
    Replace all words with the its first letter, to give a hint at what each word is, but not its length.
    DefaultFormatter.Markup
    Replace all words with underscores but keeps the first letter.
    DefaultFormatter.Normal
    Print verse text without any changes
    DefaultFormatter.RandomWords
    Randomly replaces words with dashes.
    DefaultMetaData
